mapper.select: select * from user_book where nid=#{nid} and uid=#{uid}

select novel.nid,novel.nname,novel_type.tname,novel.npicture,novel.ndescription, novel.nstatus from user_book inner join novel on novel.nid=user_book.nid inner join novel_type on novel_type.tid=novel.tid where user_book.uid=#{uid} limit #{start},#{end}
